q1.question: Is my first document really free to sign?
q1.answer: Yes! Your first document sent for signature (or signed by yourself) is completely free. Subsequent documents are priced per signature request.

q2.question: Do recipients need a 123LegalDoc or SignWell account to sign?
q2.answer: No, recipients do not need an account. They receive a secure link via email to view and sign the document directly in their browser.

q3.question: Can I draw my signature on a mobile device?
q3.answer: Absolutely. Our eSignature platform is fully responsive. Signers can draw, type, or upload their signature on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.

q4.question: What file types do you support for uploading?
q4.answer: We support PDF, DOCX, DOC, TXT, RTF, and ODT files. We automatically convert them to a secure PDF format for signing.

q5.question: How do I download the audit trail?
q5.answer: Once a document is completed (all parties have signed), a comprehensive audit trail is generated and attached to the final PDF. You can download it along with the signed document from your dashboard.

q6.question: Is 123LegalDoc + SignWell HIPAA compliant?
q6.answer: SignWell, our eSignature partner, can support HIPAA compliance for covered entities. If you require a Business Associate Agreement (BAA) for HIPAA, please contact our sales team for our enterprise plans.
